response.answer_text: A timeline is a section of a Facebook user's account that replaces the Profile and Wall pages and merges them together. On Timeline, the Facebook user can add a cover photo, edit personal information, view Facebook activity log, highlight posts or images, update status, share app activity and add new life events to profile. in other words, the timeline shows the story of your life. It's a cross between the visual blog and online scrapbook.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by ANIL KUMAR SETHY

response.answer_text: A lot of people were asking me this question, so I wrote a blog on it.  Feel free to check out the answer:http://www.abnormalmarketing.com/2011/12/a-guide-to-facebook-timelines/
